summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from August 2019 discussing efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails are between FBI agents in New York and Boston, coordinating to verify Maxwell's potential presence in Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts, and to determine appropriate follow-on actions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The FBI is actively trying to locate her, with a specific lead placing her potentially in Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts.

events.title: FBI Coordination on Maxwell's Location
events.description: FBI agents in New York and Boston exchange emails to coordinate efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell based on information from Manchester-by-the-Sea regarding her potential presence there.

keyFacts: In late August 2019, the FBI was actively trying to locate Ghislaine Maxwell.
A specific lead suggested Maxwell's potential presence in Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts.
The FBI's New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force (Squad C-20) was coordinating with the Boston field office on this matter.
The communication shows operational planning to verify her location and determine appropriate follow-on actions.
